family_offices.name: DNS Capital

recent_activities.headline: Recogni Raises $48.9 Million Series B Investment
recent_activities.description: In a financing round led by WRVI Capital, Recogni raised $48.9 million with participation from several investors including DNS Capital.
recent_activities.full_text: Recogni has successfully closed a $48.9 million Series B investment round led by WRVI Capital, supplemented by support from DNS Capital, GreatPoint Ventures, Toyota AI Ventures, BMW i Ventures, and Fluxunit – OSRAM Ventures. The funds are set to accelerate the deployment of Recogni’s advanced perception technology.

key_transactions.description: DNS Capital participated in the Series B round to support Recogni's growth.

family_offices.strategy_insights: DNS Capital focuses on long-term investments in technology and innovative sectors, aiming to partner with founders and management teams that have proven track records.
family_offices.leadership_changes: No significant leadership changes reported in the past 10 years.

family_offices.name: Promus Holdings

recent_activities.headline: Promus Equity Partners Focuses on Tech Investments
recent_activities.description: Promus Equity Partners recently launched a new investment strategy centered around technology-related companies across North America and Western Europe.
recent_activities.full_text: Promus Equity is now focusing on technology-related investments as part of a broader strategy to diversify its portfolio. The partners believe that tech innovations are crucial for long-term growth and sustainability in various sectors.

family_offices.strategy_insights: Promus Holdings is shifting its investment focus towards technology, reflecting a trend in the family office sector that favors growth-oriented industries.
family_offices.leadership_changes: Jack Allen joined the team as an associate in 2024.

recent_activities.headline: Cresset Secures $150 Million Investment from Constellation Wealth
recent_activities.description: Cresset Capital announced the completion of a $150 million minority investment from Constellation Wealth Capital, enhancing its growth potential.
recent_activities.full_text: Cresset Capital has successfully raised $150 million in a minority, long-duration investment from Constellation Wealth Capital.

recent_activities.headline: Cresset Launches New Private Equity Fund of Funds
recent_activities.description: Cresset Capital launched a new private equity fund of funds, focusing on emerging managers.
recent_activities.full_text: Cresset Capital has introduced a new private equity fund of funds aiming to leverage emerging managers.

key_transactions.description: Funding secured from Constellation Wealth to expand Cresset's investment capabilities.

family_offices.strategy_insights: Cresset's recent focus on growth-oriented investment strategies, including private equity fund of funds and equity stakes in innovative firms.
